details.sectionContent: This event is based on technical skills, critical thinking as well as knowledge. It is a combination of fun and knowledge.
Fun based event testing participant's basic knowledge of technology. Participants will also gain knowledge about some algorithms unknown to them.

This round will test the mental ability of the participants with a technical twist. Participants will be provided questions of three different kinds. Judging criteria will be based on the number of correct answers.

In this round, participants will be given a n x n chess board and they will be asked to place queen in such a way that no piece threatens another piece. If participants successfully solve the first problem they will get another grid after being able to answer a simple riddle. Based on the position of queen, participants will have to scan a QR code from which they will get a letter to form a technical word. Judgement will be made on basis of max words made by participants .
Four pairs of participants will play this round. Technical ludo will be there. Going ahead based on question & answer. Selected two will be playing final game.
